title: All gas-fired power plants to operate in May-June
description: The government on Saturday directed all gas-based power plants to operate in May and June amid an anticipated increase in demand during the summer months, invoking a key provision in the Electricity Act. This is the first time that the government is using Section 11 of the Electricity Act, 2003 for gas-based plants.
